plot: The on- and off-duty adventures of four US Navy pilots who make up The Blue Angels, the Navy's precision flying unit.
plot_en: The on- and off-duty adventures of four US Navy pilots who make up The Blue Angels, the Navy's precision flying unit.
plot_es: The on- and off-duty adventures of four US Navy pilots who make up The Blue Angels, the Navy's precision flying unit.
title: The Blue Angels
